None.Name: Frosty Storm
None.Description: Creates an icy whirlwind that moves along a defined path, hurling several icy shards, each dealing 260 damage to enemies in a 10m radius, up to 750 in total per second. May cover a maximum distance of 30m. Reusable every 30 seconds.
